name: dependencies-hierarchy

scripts.pretest: cd fixtures && pnpm recursive install --frozen-shrinkwrap --no-shared-workspace-shrinkwrap --no-link-workspace-packages && cd ../fixtureWithLinks && pnpm recursive install --frozen-shrinkwrap --link-workspace-packages --no-shared-workspace-shrinkwrap && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run lint && ts-node test --type-check && mos t
